title: I can't Login on PBE client
body:
My PBE client has quiescenced. plz help
ID: Lansic

replies.body: Are you seeing a login error of sorts? A few more details about the issue you're seeing could be really helpful!
This account is currently inactive. Please contact Player Support for further information at support.riotgames.com.

Ah, so you'll definitely want to reach out in a [**support ticket**](http://riot.com/2iGnX0K) so one of our recovery specialists can assist you with sorting this out!

If you have any questions, let me know.
